name: NCAA Football 11 Sweepstakes
description: Download the NCAA 11 Registration Pic to enter into the “Pick Your Game, Any Game Sweepstakes”! You’ll be entered for a chance to win a grand prize trip for 2 to see any regular season college football game of your choice or to be one of ten winners who will receive 40,000 MS Points!  For more details go to www.foxsports.com/EASPORTSNCAAFOOTBALL11.  All entries must be received by 11:59 PM PT on August 15, 2010. Limit of one (1) entry per person, per day, for the duration of the Sweepstakes.
